content.html: Look, JK Rowling is going to be JK Rowling. Her voice is loud and her views are awful. But we can keep telling stories of happy trans kids. Like mine, who came out at age 11 to love & support, received affirming care, and is now 19-year-old college grad with a bright future.
content.value:
Look, JK Rowling is going to be JK Rowling. Her voice is loud and her views are awful.

But we can keep telling stories of happy trans kids. Like mine, who came out at age 11 to love & support, received affirming care, and is now 19-year-old college grad with a bright future.
